subtitleNullable: A historian data of Nepal's Stock Market
descriptionNullable:
### Context
[NEPSE aka. Nepal Stock Exchange](http://www.nepalstock.com/) is a historian of Nepal's stock market and in this dataset, I tried to scrap data from its begin to the day 2019/10/10 on 2019/10/11. Please use this dataset for non commercial and education purposes only.

### Content
(Image on the banner are taken from official site.)
A ZIP file includes the CSV file for each of 218 companies. Each CSV file includes: 
* S.N. - Symbol Number.
* Contract no. - Contract Number. It is in format of timestamp for latest data.
* Stock Symbol - A symbol of company.
* Buyer Broker 
* Seller Broker
* Quantity
* Rate
* Amount 

### Reference
I have written a starter blog about [Deploying a NEPSE Data Visualizer on Heroku](https://q-viper.github.io/2020/11/21/deploying-nepse-data-visualizer-on-heroku/), please read that blog for more information about the scrapping process. However [this](https://github.com/q-viper/NEPSE-Data-Analysis) is the notebook I used to scrap.

### Inspiration
I want to study the stock market of Nepal and try to predict the market.

### Citation

Acharya, R. (2021, January). Nepal Stock Exchange Dataset, Version 1. Retrieved January 6, 2021 from https://www.kaggle.com/qramkrishna/nepal-stock-exchange-data
